scripts.tag: docker tag auth registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/auth && docker tag page registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/page && docker tag socket registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/socket && docker tag media registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/media && docker tag webhook registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/webhook && docker tag admin registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/admin
scripts.tag:prod: docker tag auth registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/auth:prod && docker tag page registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/page:prod
scripts.push: docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/auth && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/page
scripts.push:prod: docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/auth:prod && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/page:prod && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/socket:prod && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/media:prod && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/webhook:prod && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/xyz-stage/admin:prod
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run tag && npm run push && kubectl rollout restart -n default deployment auth page socket media
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run tag:prod && npm run push:prod && kubectl rollout restart -n default deployment auth page
scripts.kube:restart: kubectl rollout restart -n default deployment auth
